news.title: Kohl's shares jump more than 20% after big earnings beat
news.summary: Kohl's beats on earnings and revenue as it tries to turn around sales and find a new CEO. Kohl's beat on Earnings and Revenue as It tries to Turn Around Sales and Find a New CEO.

news.title: Fed's John Williams stresses independence as Trump moves to fire Lisa Cook
news.summary: The influential policymaker avoided commenting directly on Trump's efforts to fire Cook. The White House has yet to comment on the report. The report was first reported by CNN's iReport.

news.title: Fed responds to Trump effort to fire Lisa Cook, notes president needs 'cause'
news.summary: Federal Reserve Board Governor Lisa Cook hired Abbe Lowell to fight her termination by President Trump for a case that could land at the Supreme Court.

news.title: Abercrombie sales growth slows again, but Hollister surges 19%
news.summary: Abercrombie & Fitch's namesake brand is struggling to lap the massive growth it saw in prior quarters. Its teen-focused Hollister brand is now fueling sales.

news.title: Long-term yields keep rising as Trump amps up fight for Fed control
news.summary: Long-term U.S. Treasury yields continued to move higher Wednesday following the latest effort by President Donald Trump to take charge of the Federal Reserve.

news.title: Suze Orman shares her secret to financial independence — and how you can get there
news.summary: The money and investing guru takes a hard line on spending, home ownership, college tuition, life insurance and target-date retirement funds. The money and Investing Guru takes ahard line on Spending, Home ownership, College tuition and life insurance.

news.title: ‘They knocked her down and started biting’: My mother, 84, was viciously attacked by her neighbor’s two dogs. Do we sue?
news.summary: "The police, ambulance and animal control were all called immediately. The dogs were removed and put down," police said. "The dogs were taken to a local animal shelter and the dogs were put down"

news.title: ‘Everyone was grieving’: Did my wife’s brothers cheat her out of her inheritance? There’s a condo and $550K at stake.
news.summary: “When my wife’s mom passed away, the eldest brother took on the role as executor,” he said.

news.title: No one is expecting a global boom. This former hedge-fund manager says it’s coming and has a way to play it.
news.summary: A global economic boom is on few radars right now. But what if it happens? The best way to play that involves an unpopular asset.

news.title: The 6 things to watch as Trump blitzes the Federal Reserve
news.summary: President Trump has been putting pressure on Fed Chair Jerome Powell and his colleagues in multiple ways. Here are key things for investors to track in the coming weeks.
